channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files Corporation -- M-Files Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files Corporation -- M-Files Server

item.title: CVE-2021-41810|2024-08-04T03:22:24.315Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Admin tool allows storing configuration data with script which may then get run by another vault administrator. Requires vault admin level authentication and is not remotely exploitable

item.title: CVE-2024-4056|2024-08-01T20:26:57.309Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Denial of service condition in M-Files Server in versions before 24.4.13592.4 and after 23.11 (excluding 24.2 LTS) allows unauthenticated user to consume computing resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-0563|2024-06-04T17:58:26.994Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Denial of service condition in M-Files Server in versions before 24.2 (excluding 23.2 SR7 and 23.8 SR5) allows anonymous user to cause denial of service against other anonymous users.

item.title: CVE-2024-4056|2024-06-04T17:56:32.437Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Denial of service condition in M-Files Server in versions before 24.4.13592.4 and after 23.11 (excluding 24.2 LTS) allows unauthenticated user to consume computing resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-0563|2024-08-01T18:11:35.603Z -- m-files%20corporation -- m-files%20server
item.description: Denial of service condition in M-Files Server in versions before 24.2 (excluding 23.2 SR7 and 23.8 SR5) allows anonymous user to cause denial of service against other anonymous users.
